sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>true</before> <description>Entity dictionary on sn_grc_item is wrongly placed in Risk management scope. So moving it back to GRC profiles scope.</description> <name>Fix scope for Entity dictionary element</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideMultipleUpdate('sys_dictionary'); gr.addQuery('sys_update_name','sys_dictionary_sn_grc_item_profile'); gr.setValue('sys_scope','53f81621cb200200829cf865734c9c58'); gr.setValue('sys_package','53f81621cb200200829cf865734c9c58'); gr.execute(); ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-07-10 11:42:14</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5dd9e56f0f311010bad14bb768767e92</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Fix scope for Entity dictionary element</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">8b44b37647c17950020ba9f8536d43ba</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_5dd9e56f0f311010bad14bb768767e92</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-07-10 11:42:14</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Fix scope for Entity dictionary element
